reviews.review: This movie succeeded in every aspect that the Last Jedi failed. Thanos was the greatest MCU villain to date and Thor 's character development has been superb. The Hulk arch was a let down, but overall great film.
1/2 star taking away due to the annoying bruce banner scenes.  Other than that great movie.
Action packed, thriling, star studded, I believe Infinity War was able to pull off an effective multiplot story with coherent screnes and organized editing.

This is the best superhero/action movie I've seen so far, I'm amazed  that 1 movie could give me so many emotions: from  satisfaction, surprise to disappointment (I'm pretty sure many people would be very disappointed at first when they saw the superheroes died at the end). People may not like this ending, including me, because no one wants the villain to win, but that doesn't mean this is a bad ending, in fact it's the main thing that sets this movie apart from other movies, when superheroes don't always win and many of them have to sacrifice for the rest of the universe. Also this movie embeds really powerful messages, so much that I may have to watch it a second time to fully get them. A truly masterpiece.
But if I have to name 1 thing that the movie is lack of that is the relationship between Thanos and Gamora. The  Soul stone part is pretty important in building the character Thanos, but the movie didn't show us how Gamora had become the person that Thanos loved the most. Therefore, when Thanos mourned for her in that part, it just felt so awkward to me, those tears looked so fake to me.
A movie that shouldn't work, but does. A perfect blend of humor and drama with top-notch visuals, commendable acting, and near-perfect pacing. One of, if not Marvel's best.

It was OK....Where the hell was Ant-Man! Freakin' Grrr. Yes, during the second act you can have a bathroom break, do a load of laundry, bake a cake, go to work come back and still know pretty much whats going on.
I hate this movie. It is worse than the Russian Defenders.
a must see for any action movie fan
They Did it. Took most of their characters, stuck to the comics and delivered on a movie that was almost 30 movies in the making. An achievement Russo brothers for the win

Definitely my favorite avengers movie so far. There were a few things that could have been easily avoided but in the main one I noticed was that Dr. Strange has been able to use sling rings to chop off limbs before by opening a portal putting limb through and closing the portal. So could he not have just had everyone hold thanks down while mantis was keeping him asleep and chopped off his hand. Thanks wouldn't even be able to use the gauntlet without his hand.
